author: Nintendo of America
description:
The Mario Tennis Fever game launches February 12, 2026, exclusively on the Nintendo Switch 2 system. Pre-orders are available now: https://ninten.do/6002tNB20

It's tennis...with a twist! Mix and match 38 playable characters, the most in series history, with 30 all-new Fever Rackets, each with different special effects! Use familiar tennis actions and new defensive maneuvers, get a rally going in a variety of game modes, help Mario and friends return to normal in the story-driven Adventure mode, and ace it in local* or online** play! 

*Additional games, systems, and/or accessories may be required for multiplayer mode. Games, systems, and some accessories sold separately. 

**Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

Visit
title: Mario Tennis Fever – Overview Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
